text:
Hello everyone again,
Here is our latest interactive demo of our vision about the future of program editing, on WordPress. Make everything live editable.
<https://mobile.twitter.com/Tharzen1/status/1369673114171412485|https://mobile.twitter.com/Tharzen1/status/1369673114171412485>
I want to share it with you to get some of your comments :-)
Cheers

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/Tharzen1|@Tharzen1>: Here is an interactive demo on how ANYTHING on WordPress becomes live editable. Not just pages like <https://twitter.com/BeaverBuilder|@BeaverBuilder>  , <https://twitter.com/elemntor|@elemntor> , but also the built-in footer, menus, admin bar and even our own plugin.
<https://tharzen.com/demo-wordpress/tharzen-wordpress.html>

Who said one should not edit <https://twitter.com/WordPress|@WordPress> 's core? :smile: <https://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EwIOVoFXMAstS5a.jpg>
attachments.text:
Here is an interactive demo on how ANYTHING on WordPress becomes live editable. Not just pages like <https://twitter.com/BeaverBuilder|@BeaverBuilder>  , <https://twitter.com/elemntor|@elemntor> , but also the built-in footer, menus, admin bar and even our own plugin.
<https://tharzen.com/demo-wordpress/tharzen-wordpress.html>

Who said one should not edit <https://twitter.com/WordPress|@WordPress> 's core? :smile:

elements.text:
Hello everyone again,
Here is our latest interactive demo of our vision about the future of program editing, on WordPress. Make everything live editable.

I want to share it with you to get some of your comments :-)
Cheers
